name: Projects
desc: I believe in learning by building. My portfolio showcases a collection of projects spanning the MERN stack and other technologies I've mastered over time. Each project reflects my passion for solving real-world problems through clean and efficient code. Feel free to explore the solutions I've crafted.

name: Blogs
desc: Writing deepens understanding. My blogs capture insights, lessons, and practical knowledge I've gained throughout my journey as a developer. These articles reflect my evolving perspective on technology and problem-solving. Dive in to read, learn, and grow with me.
